Ingredients

for sauce

 oz PERIOD Tempeh

 tbs PERIOD olive oil

 cloves of garlic peeled and

minced

 lb PERIOD mushrooms sliced

 cups canned tomato puree

 cup diced tomatoes

 tsp PERIOD basil

 tsp PERIOD oregano

 tsp PERIOD salt

 tsp PERIOD pepper

Instructions

Thaw tempeh overnight in the refrigerator PERIOD

When ready to prepare cut tempeh into 12inch cubes and steam in a double boiler for  minutes PERIOD

While the tempeh is steaming saute olive oil garlic red onion and mushrooms in a saucepan until the onions and mushrooms are tender PERIOD

Then add canned tomato puree not tomato sauce diced tomatoes tempeh basil oregano salt and pepper PERIOD Simmer for  minutes on mediumlow heat while preparing spaghetti noodles PERIOD

Serve over spaghetti PERIOD

Yields about  cups enough for six servings with spaghetti PERIOD

This recipe uses tempeh which is a soy food that originated in Indonesia PERIOD It has a gentle almost nutty flavor and it is very high in protein PERIOD

Tempeh can be found in the frozen section of natural foods markets and frequently in the alternative section of many commericial grocery stores PERIOD

This sauce is great on spaghetti but any kind of pasta may be used PERIOD For additional flavor and protein sprinkle some cheese on top PERIOD Without cheese this sauce is vegan no animal products of any kind PERIOD

Verona sauce may be prepared ahead of time and reheated PERIOD It makes great leftovers
